reqs:
Pre-reqs: EPSE 521. (LING 320 is recommended.)
Co-reqs: EPSE 521.
Registrants in EPSE 519 must have been registered in EPSE 521 in the summer; Restriction: Only for students in the program in EDUC of the Deaf and Hard of Hearing
courseName: Development of English Language Skills of Deaf and Hard of Hearing Students
